Text: Re Brownsville Performance Data Cc I have attached the requested information Respectfully Mitchell Enron North America Corp From Jinsung Myung AM To Benjamin CT cc Mitchell nron Subject Re Brownsville Performance Data Ben I attached table for Caledonia as well as Brownsville Lets get the number from Mitch Mitch Could you please send attached file to Ben and myself Jinsung Benjamin CT AM To Jinsung nron cc Subject Brownsville Performance Data Forwarded by Benjamin RogersHOUECT on AM From Richard Broussard ENRON AM To Mitchell nron cc Benjamin CT Subject Brownsville Performance Data Mitch Please provide this information to Benjamin Rogers I am on vacation this week and dont have access to the data Thanks Rick Forwarded by Richard BroussardCorpEnron on AM Benjamin CT PM To Richard nron cc Subject Rick Here is the file with the performance data we worked on for the s A Brownsville tab has been added could you please assist us in putting this data together for Brownsville Please give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Ben

Re BrownsilleRequest for additional data Cc Ben I will copy the CEMS documents and try to have them to your office on Monday I have attached the Emergency Response Plan the TDEC monthly logs and SemiAnnual report Respectfully Mitchell Hurt From Gus Eghneim on PM To Benjamin CT Mitchell HurtCorpEnron Ramiro NRON Ross ES cc Dave CT Don CT Gus nron Subject Re BrownsilleRequest for additional data Ben Brownsville SPCC plan The plan is currently in draft form It will be finalized and signed by the end of the week Emergency Response Plan We are not required to have one by law However I believe we do have one for the site Mitchell please have your assistant make a copy and send it to Ben CEMS QAQC Available at the plant Mitchell will provide a copy CEMS certification report Should already be on DealBench Monthly log of emissions as required by condition of the permit Available at the plant Mitchell has already given Duke a copy for the month of October when they were onsite yesterday Annual Emissions Report condition We submitted two semiannual reports for the site so far one on January and another on July Mitchell will provide copy of the July report and the January report if available The January report covers emissions for the third and fourth quarters of This is really the annual report for because we did not operate in the first and second quarters of Duke already saw the July report covering January through June Gus Benjamin CT PM To Gus nron Dave CT cc Don CT Subject BrownsilleRequest for additional data Guys Here are some items that Duke is looking for Please let me know if you have any idea where they can be found Some may be in DealBench that I am currently going through to find Thanks agian for your assistance Ben Forwarded by Benjamin RogersHOUECT on PM Don Miller PM To Benjamin CT cc Subject BrownsilleRequest for additional data Forwarded by Don MillerHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject BrownsilleRequest for additional data Don I am an environmental manager for DENA that is managing the environmental issues for the Brownsville and Caledonia projects I request copies of the following information for the Brownsville site SPCC plan Emergency Response Plan CEMS QAAC Plan CEMS Certification Test Report Copy of monthly log of fuel heat content fuel usage total heat input per of the air permit F Copy of annual emissions reports as required under of the air permit

BPI EDR reports Cc As requested I have attached BPIs nd QTR EDR reports for your review comment and record I do not have a Final or accepted rd QTR EDR from the EPA yet Respectfully Mitchell From Gus Eghneim on PM To Benjamin CT cc Don CT Mitchell HurtCorpEnron Subject Re There is only one quarterly report required for Brownsville This is the EPA electronic data report EDR which we generate from the CEMS system and submit electronically to the EPA Mitchell Since you are generating the rd quarter reports to the EPA today would you please copy Ben on the submittal Thanks Gus Benjamin CT PM To Gus nron cc Don CT Subject Gus Do you happen to have or know where the CEMS Quarterly Report for Brownsville may be Thanks Ben
